channel.title: Weird Java error?
channel.description:
Ok then i was deleting something i tryed to add and the compiler just Started fucking up and now it ays i have 8 errors "i fixed some that weren't errors" Because it's saying that like spaces are errors but there not soo heres the compiler.
[code=java]client.java:3913: ')' expected (currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ^ client.java:3913: not a statement (currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ^ client.java:3913: not a statement (currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ^ client.java:3913: ';' expected (currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ^ client.java:3913: not a statement (currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ^ client.java:3913: ';' expected (currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ^ client.java:3916: ';' expected ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playe rItemsN[rr], KillerId, false); ^ client.java:16830: ';' expected TotalCount++; ^ 8 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
And there's nothing wrong in them areas...?

item.title: Weird Java error?
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

General Discussion board: “1 Member and 0 guests viewing.”
Server Help board: "9 Members and 5 Guests are viewing this board. "

I think you can get help faster by posting it HERE Cause this is the wrong section.

I see you posted it there too, just have some patience and don’t post it everywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird Java error?
item.dc:creator: @lungxapples lungxapples
item.description:
@lungxapples wrote:

Ok then i was deleting something i tryed to add and the compiler just Started fucking up and now it ays i have 8 errors “i fixed some that weren’t errors” Because it’s saying that like spaces are errors but there not soo heres the compiler.

client.java:3913: ')' expected (currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ^ client.java:3913: not a statement (currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ^ client.java:3913: not a statement (currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ^ client.java:3913: ';' expected (currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ^ client.java:3913: not a statement (currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ^ client.java:3913: ';' expected (currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ^ client.java:3916: ';' expected ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playe rItemsN[rr], KillerId, false); ^ client.java:16830: ';' expected TotalCount++; ^ 8 errors Press any key to continue . . .

And there’s nothing wrong in them areas…?
